posts.content:
One owner from new, RHD Canterbury Pitt, 9 months MOT and looks like it just left the factory....£12,900....

http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/vw-splitscree ... 4ae5b61d72
This bus sold on ebay about 4 months ago and fetched, from memory, circa £25 I believe. It was a genuine bus but this is a scam 100%.

If it is then this is a Zero feedback scammer too...
I do hate it when we have to deal with the inexperienced....
Maybe he did buy the bus and does not like the driving position...
Off to ask questions...
Nice bus.... anyone on here own it?
Even cheaper here look, http://www.pre67vw.com/classifieds/detail.aspx?id=6977

It's the same photos as the old ebay advert. I believe the owner was in Suffolk. I also seem to recall it was for sale on the samba and it fetched circa what they wanted for it on ebay. It didn't go cheap and the description was very comprehensive on the previous advert and contained the same text as in the current advert.

author.location: Zummerset.. Land of Cider, Combines & Campers

posts.content:
volkswagen camper 1964 splitscreen microbus
canterbury pitt one owner from new
stored since 1980s,
all new brakes , exhaust , tyres and all new service parts
started straight away with new petrol after 30 years of storage
original engine and gearbox 1200cc , 6 volts
2 berth , gas cooker , sink ,runs and drives very well
one key fits all locks, some service history and old mots
canterbury pitt interior with original cushions
curtains and stripped door canopy
has had an outside respray to the original colours
all new rubbers and new german bumpers
very straight and original one owner splitscreen camper
9 months mot ,tax exemptGoogle this text and it goes to several sites...

Had a message back on ebay saying dad died in Germany, use Payapl guarantee service.
Sent them a message not that old scam again.

Just had a message from ebay saying my account has been used in unauthorised transaction and to change my login. Account has been locked.
Checked in my messages in my account and same message.
Copied the message ID number and did a search says is a complicated scam.
If your account is locked it is genuine if account still active is a scam to get your log in password.
Are these scammers the death of the Internet ? How do you know what is real the ebay message was just like a real message.
Anyone else had this one ????
Yes...oooooooh I just supplied a scam password and copied it all to ebay..
They do not have a concience. ..hence why I do everything to scam the scammers.....

Rossana Lucy Turner <turnerrossanalucy@gmail.com>
5:59 PM (1 hour ago)

to me
Hello, I still have the camper for sale, the condition is excellent and it has no damages or any faults. All necessary documents available. My current location is Scotland due to my work commitments. If this is going to be a quick sale, I will let it go for £6100 delivered at my costs.The deal will go through eBay and PayPal. Thank you

https://plus.google.com/u/0/109467686185949101170/posts


Oh so now the guise is I am female and cannot possibly be a scammer ...LOL




Time to play!

Me

Yes I am really keen to buy...I am in Scotland...I can come and see and hand over the cash tonight...

Let me know!

Oh what is the VIN number of the bus please?

I want to run a check...on if it appears on the database?

Cheers....
Rossana Lucy Turner
Rossana Lucy Turner's profile photo
turnerrossanalucy@gmail.com

Hi, I can not go at this time in possession of these documents they are to the department delivery of camper.
I am offering free delivery and I will agree for a 5-7 days of full inspection period ( after the date you receive the camper ). This means that you have 7 days to inspect the camper for any damages and decide if you want to keep it or not!Because I will sign eBay's return policy, your money will be insured by them and you will have the option to reject the deal, only if we go through PayPal as well. If this is the case, you will receive a full refund (money back) from PayPal and I will have to take the camper back on my cost! You can read more about it following the link below:
http://safety-center-page-eb-ay.co.uk-h ... y/Help.php
Let me know if the above return policy is acceptable and if you want to purchase the camper please confirm your PayPal email for further instructions.
Thanks

Me...
8:02 PM (0 minutes ago)

to Rossana
That all sound fine...
So how do I pay?
I will come to see and hand over the cash before you deliver..
No need to get eBay or Paypal involved...they take a big cut you know...I am really keen it looks a super bus..
Can you send me a link to the advert...I seem to have lost the link..

KEEN!

Ha Ha Very good Graham, I will put money on you not getting a reply.
But good to waste their time.
I had a quick look around your bus's with Dave today.
it's like before and after, if you know what I mean !

I believe the page link is a "spoof" page I have reported to eBay and received acknowledgement...

I think the command of English is a slight give away...
I am sad that they are not removed from internet access..
You can trace back to the IP address and the actual address!
